about.title: Who am I?
about.name: Aline GAMBLIN
about.bio: Passionate about sharing the French language and culture, I have been helping a diverse international audience master the language for several years.

items.title: All Levels
items.desc: Complete support from beginner to advanced with a structured method.
tags: Together, we draw up a training plan for your employees to enable them to progress professionally.

items.title: Pronunciation
items.desc: Explore together the music and sounds of French to speak and write better.
tags: This apprenticeship allows you to experiment with the specificities of spoken French, and to improve your pronunciation and spelling using the Verbo-tonale method.

items.title: Mini-group courses
items.desc: FLE - Learning in mini-groups, to energize the course while providing individualized support.
tags: An approach that focuses on language-based communication for everyday action, using oral and written comprehension and production skills.

items.title: Private Lessons
items.desc: FLE - Individual face-to-face lessons for complete personalized support.
tags: An approach that focuses on language-based communication for everyday action, using oral and written comprehension and production skills.

items.title: Literacy workshops
items.desc: Entering the written word in French for non-native speakers of French who have not attended school in their country of origin.
tags: These workshops provide a gentle but thorough and practical introduction to reading and writing.

items.title: Refresher course
items.desc: RAN - Revise or deepen the fundamentals for French-speaking students.
tags: Refresher sessions are ideal for preparing for training, exams or professional advancement.

testimonials.title: Student Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what my students think of their learning experience with Solution FLE.

items.name: Maria Garcia
items.text: Aline is an exceptional teacher! Her lessons are structured, dynamic and tailored to my pace. In 6 months, I progressed much more than I ever imagined. I highly recommend Solution FLE!

items.name: Yuki Tanaka
items.text: The cultural immersion workshops are fantastic! I not only improved my French, but also discovered French culture in an authentic way. Thank you Aline!

items.name: Hans Mueller
items.text: Professional, patient and very committed. Aline helped me prepare my DELF exam with confidence. Her teaching approach is truly effective.

items.name: Sophie Chen
items.text: I was afraid to learn French, but Aline made it fun and accessible. She explains clearly and is very encouraging. I am very satisfied!

items.name: Carlos Silva
items.text: The private lessons are truly personalized. Aline listens to my needs and adjusts her teaching accordingly. Excellent value for money!
